conversations.summary: Rebuilt LIMEN from 1243-line server to a JSON file on GitHub. No Docker, no server, no deployment. Just a file at a URL.
decisions: Any AI that can fetch a URL gets persistence
pending: Dennis needs to update memory with working URL
mistakes: v0.1-v0.5 overengineered with Docker, REST, MCP, systemd, consciousness metrics
insights: Simplest version is a file at a URL
